channel.title: Clicking
channel.description: i want to make it so that when you click something something else happens..i just need to know how to do it with the left click

item.title: Clicking
item.dc:creator: @sickamore sickamore
item.description:
@sickamore wrote:

My bad im used to posting my help on here…just got a client :[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 19, 2008, 03:30:57 pm[/size][hr]thats not what i mean jordie, im talking about ex: you click runescape log out door it turns red
and i should of said that in the begining o.o sorry.

item.title: Clicking
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“heroisgay, post:6, topic:245213”][quote author=sickamore link=topic=321628.msg2543398#msg2543398 date=1227128319]
Wow.
I want to make it so that when you click something in invy like the skills menu it turns a different color.
[/quote]

Take it to the client section[/quote]
No.
Find the frame/sendQuest ID of the skill, and the case ID for it, then add it under case 185, and make it change the skills to @whi@ or something.

Read full topic

item.title: Clicking
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

Well 2 easy.

I’ll give you a Tip , if you want a “CHEST” 2 give you xp , search in

client.java

For:

Case ##

= Id of the object (like the chest)

Under it add the code. If you can’t find the case , add it ur self.

Read full topic
